-- test: metrics list all --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} metrics
-- expect --
jvm.memory.used
-- expect --
jvm.memory.max
-- expect --
jvm.threads.live
-- expect --
system.cpu.count
-- expect --
process.uptime


-- test: metrics query specific metric --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} metrics jvm.memory.used
-- expect --
NAME         jvm.memory.used
-- expect --
BASE UNIT    bytes
-- expect --
MEASUREMENTS
-- expect --
STATISTIC


-- test: metrics filter by pattern --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --pod {{pod}} metrics --filter jvm.memory
-- expect --
jvm.memory.committed
-- expect --
jvm.memory.max
-- expect --
jvm.memory.used
-- expect:not --
jvm.threads.live
-- expect:not --
system.cpu.count
